title.rendered: Three Musicians Selected For NYSSMA All-State

content.rendered:
Three dedicated Saratoga Springs High School musicians were selected as participants and/or alternates for the 2022 NYSSMA All-State Performing Ensemble in Rochester, NY. These students were selected out of approximately 6,500 total All-State auditions across the state.

  • Andre Culpepper-Wehr – Jazz Vibraphone
  • Amelia Safran – Double Bass
  • Evan Weatherwax – Tuba

Students selected for a NYSSMA All-State ensemble successfully performed a rigorous level 6 All-State audition at their local NYSSMA festival in the Spring.  The students are invited to rehearse on December 1-3 with a performance on December 4, 2022, at the Eastman School of Music. This is one of the finest musical achievements and recognitions for a high school musician in New York State.
